name: Zeichnet die 7. Kriegsanleihe LCCN2004665954 - from Commons

desc.html: English:  Title: Zeichnet die 7. Kriegsanleihe Abstract: Poster shows a cherub(?) pouring coins from a bag; in the background a graph shows amounts collected at the various war loan drives. Text: Subscribe to the 7th War Loan at the local bank, all funds stay in the country. Physical description: 1 print (poster) : lithograph, color ; 58 x 51 cm. Notes: Forms part of: Rehse-Archiv für Zeitgeschichte und Publizistik.; Franz Koch, 1917.; Title from item.
